SummaryEnglish: Honda-san is at war - with business, with out-of-print books, and with people who love manga! Who knew there were so many laughs to be found at the manga counter of a bookstore?! These are the day-to-day happenings that take place at a certain bookstore where the love of manga is abundant.

1.TitleEnglish: The Tongue-Tied Bookseller / Why... / Lost in Manga: Hothead Edition
The Handsome Guy is First in Line / Yaoi Girls from OVERSEAS!!!
1.SummaryEnglish: Meet the enthusiastic customers of the bookstore who bring excitement and stimulation to Honda-san’s job.

2.TitleEnglish: Let Me Introduce My Crazy Colleagues in This Bookstore! / Books, Written Instructions, and Me / Go! Azarashi-san
2.SummaryEnglish: The long holiday is coming up, and the bookstore is swamped by a ton of shipments. How do the staff make it through?!

3.TitleEnglish: A Battle Without Honor or Humanity / Lost in Manga
3.SummaryEnglish: Honda-san gives us insight into the interactions between a bookstore and a publisher.

4.TitleEnglish: A Reception Training of Hell / Mission: An Outside Work-ish Job
4.SummaryEnglish: It’s Honda-san’s turn to attend a customer service coaching session.

5.TitleEnglish: An INQUIRY / It's a Book Signing!! Everyone Gather Up / A Fascinating Erotic Story
5.SummaryEnglish: Honda is faced with restocking popular titles, dealing with energetic foreigners, overseeing the visit of a famous author, and mulling over questions of censorship.

6.TitleEnglish: The Man with a Secret Power / Our Fair-Day War
6.SummaryEnglish: Honda-san introduces Assistant Manager Majutsushi, who has the uncanny ability of knowing exactly which books to order.

7.TitleEnglish: Tell Me! Wholesaler-san / A Networking Drinking Party for Booksellers
7.SummaryEnglish: Honda-san teaches us about the wonderful people known as wholesalers.

8.TitleEnglish: Bookstores are so Wonderful! / The Shelves with and without Restrictions / Go for it, Azarashi-san ~The Hidden Ambition~
8.SummaryEnglish: The bookstore is visited by all kinds of customers, some of whom like books, and some of whom love bookstores.

9.TitleEnglish: A Book about Life, Death, and Rebirth
9.SummaryEnglish: Books go out of print, but under certain special circumstances, they can be brought back from the dead.

10.TitleEnglish: An Outstanding Bookseller / Swapping Section Heads
10.SummaryEnglish: What makes a good bookseller? The answer may not be as straightforward as it seems.

11.TitleEnglish: The Alternate Skull-face Bookseller Honda-san / You Can Quit Your Job Whenever You Want
11.SummaryEnglish: If you’ve ever worked in retail, you’ve dealt with nasty customers. But what if the good customers are worse than the bad ones?

12.TitleEnglish: Merry Christmas, Mr. Bookstore / It's Time to Close
12.SummaryEnglish: Christmas is a time of madness at the bookstore. Closing time is also a time of madness at the bookstore.
